general.headline: These Analysts Boost Their Forecasts On MicroStrategy Following Q2 Results - Strategy  ( NASDAQ:MSTR )
general.summary: MicroStrategy Inc MSTR reported upbeat sales for the second quarter on Thursday. Strategy reported second-quarter revenue of $114.49 million, beating analyst estimates of $112.96 million. The company reported second-quarter adjusted earnings of $32.52 per share, according to Benzinga Pro.

asian.headline: From Pixels To Paychecks: How Minecraft Is Launching Gen Z's Careers
asian.summary: Minecraft has sold over 350 million copies since its launch in 2011, making it the best-selling video game of all time, according to Business Insider. It's also raised a generation of software engineers, coders, and developers. Colin McDonald started playing the game when he was just 13.
